availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Midway, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Native of Germany. Married to Elizabeth Lehmann. Father of Louisa Lehmann, Alice Lehmann, Anna E. Lehmann, and John w. Lehmann. Cabinet maker in Midway in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Midway, p. 18.
Find A Grave, "David Lehmann (March 17, 1826-September 24, 1911)," Memorial #49744453, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49744453 (accessed April 5, 2018).
